pageContext.claim: “President Obama said, ‘You'll never bring manufacturing back.’ I said, ‘What are you talking about?’ It's all about manufacturing. And we're bringing it back in record numbers. Nobody can believe it.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump often boasts that companies are rushing back into the United States. Some big investments have been announced, but economic growth is still following the same pace seen during Barack Obama's administration. GDP growth and growth in the number of manufacturing jobs and establishments, for example, has been steady from Obama to Trump.
